PrivacyViolationsSection.title: OneDrive tracks, shares, and monitors your data. Internxt protects it.
PrivacyViolationsSection.description: OneDrive may be secure, but it’s a nightmare for your privacy. Switch to Internxt for full security for your documents, videos, and photos. With Internxt, nobody but you can access your files, not even us.

descriptions: OneDrive collects a wide range of personal data based on how you interact with its services, including files stored on the platform, metadata, and device information, far beyond what’s needed to operate the service.

Voice data from Cortana or other Microsoft services may be reviewed by human employees to train AI systems and improve recognition models, posing a risk of unintended exposure of your private conversations.

Microsoft employees can access and review user content under certain circumstances, such as investigating policy violations, law enforcement requests, or system maintenance. Whatever you store in OneDrive could potentially be viewed or monitored by these employees.

If you use OneDrive, your data is likely also being used by its other products, such as Windows, Office, Outlook, and Cortana. This allows for cross-service data collection and user tracking across other platforms you may use.

WhyNeedAlternativeSection.title: The best alternative to OneDrive is Internxt
WhyNeedAlternativeSection.description: What OneDrive demonstrates in security fails in terms of privacy. For full privacy, get total security combined with zero-knowledge encryption from Internxt.

descriptions: OneDrive and other cloud services may scan or analyze your files. At Internxt, there are no trackers, no AI scanning, and no hidden backdoors. Internxt can’t read your files, so your photos, documents, and videos remain private. You have full control over your cloud.

OneDrive manages encryption keys on its servers, giving them total control of your data. As a result, storing your files with OneDrive poses a huge risk for your privacy, as Microsoft could access your content, photos, or videos at any time.

OneDrive states in its terms and conditions that it collects data from you through your interactions with its products, plus data collection from third parties. OneDrive employees can also monitor your voice data to train its AI and improve its voice recognition.

faq.question: Is Internxt a more secure and private alternative to OneDrive?
answer: Yes, Internxt uses post-quantum and zero-knowledge encryption that guarantees nobody but you can view your files. Microsoft manages the encryption keys on its own servers, meaning it could access your files or give access to the government or law enforcement.
Additional features such as VPN, Antivirus, Device Cleaner, Dark Web Monitor, Meet, and Mail also offer you additional protection from hackers and data breaches.

faq.question: What is post-quantum encryption, and is it more secure?
answer: Unlike standard encryption, post-quantum encryption algorithms are built to resist powerful quantum attacks, making PQE a more secure OneDrive alternative.
This cryptography method is used by Internxt to ensure that your lifetime cloud storage plan protects you against future cybersecurity threats and is available for all plans at no extra cost.
